content.html: It's telling how obsessed these ppl are w/ my age, as if being in ur 30s is somehow a walking corpse? They spent all of '20 calling me a "little girl" "younger than most at NYT". When that didn't stick it flipped to I'm "too old" to cover tech (while men can cover tech @ any age) twitter.com/libsoftiktok/s…
content.value: It's telling how obsessed these ppl are w/ my age, as if being in ur 30s is somehow a walking corpse? They spent all of '20 calling me a "little girl" "younger than most at NYT". When that didn't stick it flipped to I'm "too old" to cover tech (while men can cover tech @ any age)
